episodes.title: The Internet's Secret Cult: Dr A. Egon Cholakian & AllatRa Strike Back
episodes.description:
In Mid-2025, a man went viral but... for the wrong reasons. And his climate cult wasn't going down without a fight. But... a whistleblower within AllatRa threatens to expose the entire operation. 

𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐓𝐨 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐋𝐢𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐫𝐲
𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐲 𝐔𝐩𝐝𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝:
📷 Instagram: @avlancasterfilms 
💳 Get Your Library Card: https://patreon.com/lancasterlibrary
📧 Submit Film Idea: thelancasterlibrary@gmail.com 
🎶 Soundtrack: Elijah Younas [Allied Music Group Co] 

𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗺 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
In mid-2024, What began as a curious probe by streamer @destiny  into a bizarre viral figure spiraled into something far deeper. Fast forward to mid-2025, and the story has only grown darker.
The original film was targeted and struck down by AllatRa, also known as Egon Cholakian’s climate cult—a clandestine group accused of manipulating global narratives under the guise of saving the planet. Their attempt to silence The Lancaster Library only fuels suspicion that we were right on target. But now, there’s a turn they didn’t see coming. A whistleblower from within the organization has come forward, threatening to expose the entire operation from the inside. 

𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬:
0:00 - 1:03 Introduction
1:04 - 6:23 The AllatRa Whistleblower
6:24 - 7:04 Public Service Announcement
7:05 - 9:01 Where is Egon?
9:02 - 11:00 Lancaster Library vs AllatRa
11:01 - 11:41 Surprise Announcement
11:42 - 12:20 Credits

𝐒𝐨𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐞𝐬:
●  "Vlad" 's Email Correspondence 
●  robbywells.com

𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐬𝐮𝐫𝐞:
The following content is for educational, documentary, and artistic purposes only. I do not condone the harassment of the individual mentioned in today's film. This film includes speculation and centers around an ongoing case where the full details are not currently known. For that reason, it’s possible that some of the information included is not correct. This is simply a snapshot in time of where the story is at now.

episodes.title: The Internet's Secret Cult: Dr A. Egon Cholakian & AllatRa
episodes.description:
In Mid-2024, a man went viral but... was he a man at all? Or the work of an advanced AI model? 

𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐓𝐨 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐋𝐢𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐫𝐲

𝗙𝗶𝗹𝗺 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
In Mid-2024, a man went viral but... was he even a man at all? Or the work of an advanced AI model? Whose sole duty is to artificially pump out propaganda content. A peculiar "Dead Internet Theory" was brought to the forefront by streamer  @destiny  but underneath his investigation was a rabbit hole full of brainwashing, world politics and even a secretive cult hidden under one (maybe) real man's web of lies. Not bad... for a day at the library...

0:00 - Introduction
1:48 - Initial Descent Into The Rabbit Hole
3:55 - Lancaster Library Opening Credits
4:23 - Chapter 1: The Earth Save Science Collaborative
10:13 - Lancaster Library Card Commercial 
10:48 - Chapter 2: AllatRa Climate & Cultism
17:40 - The Raid on AllatRa
19:42 - AllatRa: Science & Telepathy
22:15 - Chapter 3: The Final Chapter
23:28 - Final Thoughts
25:53 - Credits
27:23 - End of Episode 1
